Classes/MBInAppMessageManager.html.name: MBInAppMessageManager

Classes/MBMessage.html.name: MBMessage

Classes/MBInAppMessageBottomBannerView.h.name: gestureRecognizerShouldBegin(_:)

Classes/MBInAppMessageTopBannerView.html.name: gestureRecognizerShouldBegin(_:)
Classes/MBInAppMessageTopBannerView.html.abstract: Prevents the user to scroll the view up when the animation is in progress, or the view is not visible.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.name: backgroundStyle(forMessage:)
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.abstract: The background style that will be used for the message.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.name: titleColor(forMessage:)
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.abstract: The title text color for the view.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.name: bodyColor(forMessage:)
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.abstract: The text color for the body label for the view.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.name: closeButtonBackgroundColor(forMessage:)
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.abstract: The background color for the close button.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.name: button1BackgroundColor(forMessage:)
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.abstract: The background color for the first action button.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.name: button1TitleColor(forMessage:)
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.abstract: The title color for the first action button.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.name: button2BackgroundColor(forMessage:)
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.abstract: The background color for the second action button.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.name: button2TitleColor(forMessage:)
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.abstract: The title color for the second action button.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.name: button2BorderColor(forMessage:)
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.abstract: The border color for the second action button.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.name: buttonsTextFont(forMessage:)
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.abstract: The font used fot the titles of the buttons.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewDelegate.htm.name: viewWillAppear(view:)
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewDelegate.htm.abstract: This function is called just before a MBInAppMessageView appears.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewDelegate.htm.name: viewDidAppear(view:)
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewDelegate.htm.abstract: This function is called just after a MBInAppMessageView is displayed, when the animation finishes.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewDelegate.htm.name: viewWillDisappear(view:)
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewDelegate.htm.abstract: This function is called just before a MBInAppMessageView is being removed.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewDelegate.htm.name: viewDidDisappear(view:)
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewDelegate.htm.abstract: This function is called just after a MBInAppMessageView has been removed, when the animation finishes.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewDelegate.htm.name: buttonPressed(view:button:)
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewDelegate.htm.abstract: Ths function is called when a button of the MBInAppMessageView has been pressed. Tthis function will be called after the animation for the view has finished.

Views.html#/c:@M@MBMessagesSwift@objc(cs.name: MBInAppMessageView
Views.html#/c:@M@MBMessagesSwift@objc(cs.abstract: A general view used as an interface. This class is just an interface and should not be instantiate, the SDK will instantiate only subclasses of this class.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewDelegate.htm.name: MBInAppMessageViewDelegate
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewDelegate.htm.abstract: This protocol can be used to receive calls when a MBInAppMessageView is displayed and is hidden, it will also receives a call when a button is pressed.

Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.name: MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegate
Protocols/MBInAppMessageViewStyleDelegat.abstract: This protocol can be used to use different colors and fonts to the in-app messages views.

Classes/MBInAppMessageBottomBannerView.h.abstract: This view is displayed as a banner coming from the bottom when the in app message has the style MBInAppMessageStyle.bottomBanner

Views.html#/c:@M@MBMessagesSwift@objc(cs.abstract: This view is displayed in the middle of the screen, coming from the bottom (as a modal view) when the in app message has the style MBInAppMessageStyle.center

Views.html#/c:@M@MBMessagesSwift@objc(cs.abstract: This view is displayed in the middle of the screen, coming from the bottom (as a modal view) when the in app message has the style MBInAppMessageStyle.fullscreenImage.

Classes/MBInAppMessage.html#/s:15MBMessa.name: duration
Classes/MBInAppMessage.html#/s:15MBMessa.abstract: The duration it will be on screen, after this duration the message will disappear automatically, the default is 5 seconds

Classes/MBInAppMessage.html#/s:15MBMessa.abstract: The title of the message, it’s optional and defaults to nil.

Classes/MBInAppMessage.html#/s:15MBMessa.name: titleColor
Classes/MBInAppMessage.html#/s:15MBMessa.abstract: An optional color for the title, defaults to nil.

Classes/MBInAppMessage.html#/s:15MBMessa.name: bodyColor
Classes/MBInAppMessage.html#/s:15MBMessa.abstract: An optional color for the body, defaults to nil.

Classes/MBInAppMessage.html#/s:15MBMessa.name: image
Classes/MBInAppMessage.html#/s:15MBMessa.abstract: An optional image of the message, defaults to nil.

Classes/MBInAppMessage.html#/s:15MBMessa.name: backgroundColor
Classes/MBInAppMessage.html#/s:15MBMessa.abstract: An optional background color, defaults to nil.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: The delegate of the plugin, you can use this to check if the message check fails.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: viewDelegate
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: The view delegate of the plugin, you can use this to have callbacks when messages

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: styleDelegate
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: The style delegate of the plugin, you can use tthis to customize colors and fonts of

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: messagesDelay
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: The delayed used to delay the presenting of the message after a successful fetch.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: debug
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: Settings this var to true will always display the messages returned by the api, even if they’ve been already showed.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: This method initialises the messages plugin with the parameters passed

Classes/MBMessages.html#/c:@M@MBMessages.name: checkMessages()
Classes/MBMessages.html#/c:@M@MBMessages.abstract: This method checks the messages from the server and shows them, if needed.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: pushToken
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: The pushToken of the push notifications plugin of MBurger.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: userDidInteractWithNotificationBlock
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: A block that will be called when the user interacts with a push notification, it can be used as an unique point to take actions when the user interacts with a notification.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: projectPushTopic
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: A push topic that represents all devices, used to send a push to all apps

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: devicePushTopic
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: A push topic that represents this device, used to send a push to only this device

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: registerDeviceToPush(deviceToken:success:failure:)
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: Register a device token to receive push notifications.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: registerPushMessages(toTopic:success:failure:)
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: Register the current device to a push topic.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: registerPushMessages(toTopics:success:failure:)
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: Register the current device to an array of push topics.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: unregisterPushMessages(fromTopic:success:failure:)
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: Unregister the current device from a push topic.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: unregisterPushMessages(fromTopics:success:failure:)
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: Unregister the current device from an array of topics.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: unregisterPushMessagesFromAllTopics(success:failure:)
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: Unregister the current device from all topics is registred to.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: userNotificationCenter(willPresent:)
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: This function and userNotificationCenter(didReceive response... is used by the MBMessages SDK to have informations when a push arrives and the user interacts with it.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: userNotificationCenter(didReceive:)
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: This function and userNotificationCenter(willPresent notification... is used by the MBMessages SDK to have informations when a push arrives and the user interacts with it.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: applicationStartupOrder
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: The order in wich MBurger will call the startup blocks.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.name: applicationStartupBlock()
Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: The startup blocks called by the main MBurger SDK.

Classes/MBMessages.html#/s:15MBMessagesS.abstract: Presents in app messages to the user.

Classes/MBMessages.html.abstract: This is the main entry point to manage all the messages features of MBurger.
